message: Let's start fair. I get the majority, you get a good start.
I'll start with a strong counteroffer. Your turn to respond.
I'm willing to compromise a bit, but let's not go too far in one round. We both need to play this strategically.
I'm not giving up yet. You're getting closer to a fair deal, but I'm not there yet.
I'm still willing to negotiate, but I'm not giving up a significant chunk of the money. We need to find a middle ground.
I'm starting to get a bit desperate, but I still think I can do better than this. Your turn to respond.
We're running out of time. I'm getting more and more desperate, but I still believe we can reach a fair deal.  Let's try to meet in the middle.
